events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The issue was identified as a refund request based on the customer's dissatisfaction and refund keywords.
Assigning this refund case to our billing specialist to handle the request promptly and efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason you would like a refund to assist you better?
My order number is 123456789 and the product does not work as described on the website, so I want a full refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund, and you should see the amount credited back within 5 business days.
Thanks for your help! I appreciate the quick response and the refund process starting so soon.
Your refund request has been successfully processed. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund without any issues. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing your refund case now as the issue has been resolved to your satisfaction. Thank you for contacting support.
